title: Tools
subtitle: Tools Worthy Of Praise
intro: This is a list of tools that I like to use.
body: <p>Items <strong>strongly emphasized</strong> are newly discovered and/or especially great.</p>  <h2 id="tools-web">Web and Browser Extensions</h2>  <ul>    <li><a href="http://jsbin.com/">jsbin.com</a> - of all the online html/css/js editors, this is still my favorite</li>    <li><a href="https://slack.com/">Slack</a> - this is chat software we currently use at work</li>    <li><strong><a href="https://mightytext.net">MightyText</a> - keep your phone in your pocket and text/SMS from your computer</strong></li>    <li><a href="http://feedly.com/">Feedly</a> - a nice alternative to Google Reader</li>    <li><a href="http://userstyles.org/">Stylish</a> - override CSS in Firefox &#38; Chrome (<a href="http://userstyles.org/styles/100007/tab-width">for example</a>)</li>  </ul>  <h2 id="tools-x">Cross-Platform</h2>  <ul>    <li><strong><a href="http://synergy-project.org/">Synergy</a> - share a keyboard, mouse, and clipboard across multiple computers on a network</strong></li>    <li><a href="https://justgetflux.com/">f.lux</a> - auto adjust monitor brightness based on daylight</li>    <li><a href="https://code.google.com/p/namebench/">namebench</a> - benchmark your DNS and compare it to others to see which is best</li>    <li><a href="http://www.onenote.com/notebooks">OneNote</a> - now the it's free for just about any OS I've been using it a lot more</li>  </ul>  <h2 id="tools-win">Windows</h2>  <ul>    <li><a href="http://www.flos-freeware.ch/notepad2.html">Notepad2</a> - my favorite basic text editor</li>    <li><a href="http://www.getpaint.net/">Paint .Net</a> - my favorite text editor (be sure to get the <a href="http://forums.getpaint.net/index.php?/topic/22841-new-optipng-file-type-plugin-june-12-2012/">optipng plugin</a>)</li>where I work</li>    <li><strong><a href="http://www.getmailbird.com/">Mailbird</a> - this is currently my favorite email client</strong> (needs a calendar though)</li>    <li><a href="http://www.randyrants.com/sharpkeys/">Sharpkeys</a> - I use this solely to map <kbd>CAPSLOCK</kbd> to <kbd>Mute</kbd></li>    <li><a href="http://winmerge.org/">WinMerge</a> - compare files &#38; folders</li>    <li><a href="http://www.nattyware.com/pixie.php">Pixie</a> - find a color on the screen</li>    <li><a href="http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/bb842062">Sysinternals</a> - many windows utilities, autoruns and process explorer are 2 that I use the most (also a <a href="http://live.sysinternals.com/">network share available to run them from directly</a>)</li>    <li><strong><a href="http://www.fosshub.com/ConEmu.html">ConEmu</a> - tabbed console emulator that supports different shells</strong></li>  <li><a href="https://github.com/dahlbyk/posh-git">posh-git</a> - this is the best way to use git on windows</li>    <li><a href="https://windirstat.info/">WinDirStat</a> - great for seeing what is taking up space on your drives</li>    <li><a href="http://www.slysoft.com/en/virtual-clonedrive.html">Virtual CloneDrive</a> - a nice lightweight virtual disk drive</li>    <li><a href="http://www.ultrapico.com/expresso.htm">Expresso</a> - handy tool for developing and debugging regular expressions</li>    <li><a href="http://blois.us/Rooler/">rooler</a> - easily measure on-screen items</li>    <li><a href="http://www.photoscape.org/ps/main/download.php">PhotoScape</a> - an OK GIF editor</li>    <li><a href="http://filehippo.com/updatechecker">FileHippo Update Checker</a> - scans for out of date stuff and provides links to updates</li>  </ul>
